content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Wrong End If you are using a slashing weapon, you take 1d6 slashing damage and 1 persistent bleed damage. Melee
Phantom Wind You take a -2 circumstance penalty to ranged attacks until the end of your next turn. Ranged
Overthink It Your target gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against attacks you make against it until the end of your next turn. Unarmed
Power Down Until healed, you are stupefied 2. Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #2
